name: Playa San Luis
description: Playa San Luis is a beautiful beach known for its clear waters and relaxing atmosphere, perfect for sunbathing and enjoying the coastal scenery.

name: Avenida Perimetral
description: Avenida Perimetral is a key road that offers scenic views of the city, leading you through historical landmarks and offering a lively atmosphere.

name: Iglesia Santa Inés
description: The Iglesia Santa Inés is one of the most significant historical churches in Cumaná, renowned for its beautiful colonial architecture and serene atmosphere. It serves as a place of worship and cultural heritage.

name: Plaza Bolívar
description: Plaza Bolívar is a central square in the city, dedicated to the liberator Simón Bolívar, surrounded by historical buildings and a peaceful park atmosphere.

name: Catedral de Cumaná
description: The Catedral de Cumaná is a beautiful colonial-era cathedral, with a majestic façade and rich history that dates back to the 18th century.

name: Museo de Arte de Sucre
description: The Museo de Arte de Sucre showcases a variety of local and regional art, offering visitors a glimpse into the rich cultural heritage of the area.

name: Parque Nacional Mochima
description: Parque Nacional Mochima is a protected national park known for its diverse ecosystems, including beaches, forests, and abundant wildlife, perfect for outdoor activities.

name: La Loma de la Cruz
description: La Loma de la Cruz offers panoramic views of Cumaná and the surrounding area, providing a peaceful spot for reflection and appreciation of the landscape.
